pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provenance Visualizer // Displays provenance graphically for provenance collected by the 'rdt' or 'rdtLite' packages, or other tools providing compatible PROV JSON output. The exact format of the JSON created by 'rdt' and 'rdtLite' is described in https://github.com/End-to-end-provenance/ExtendedProvJson. More information about rdtLite and associated tools is available at https://github.com/End-to-end-provenance/ and Barbara Lerner, Emery Boose, and Luis Perez (2018), Using Introspection to Collect Provenance in R, Informatics, doi: 10.3390/informatics5010012.
